handler.description: Fetches the latest SWMF data from NASA and stores the images for further processing.
Fetches the latest CBX N0R radar images from NASA's Community Coordinated Modeling Center and stores it for future processing.
Fetch the latest 304 nm photos of the Sun from the Solar Dynamic Observatory.
Fetch a set of calculated positions for many satellites in orbit around earth.
Scrape the fetched satellite data for structured values. Persist this data in REDIS.
Dumps a JSON blob of NEXRAD site locations and altitudes into REDIS
